name: Tint Dash
description:
How quick your brain work's !! NOT SURE??
Download "Tint Dash" now and test how fast it work's :)

◉ Drag your finger left or right to move
◉ Pass through correct color
◉ Wrong color will have you start again
◉ Avoid hitting either sides of the screen
◉ Game play speeds up

Get the highest score and share with your friends and family to beat your high score.
